name: Bistro Veal Burgers
author: Theresa Rezentes
summary: These burgers use veal for tender, non-greasy burgers that taste like they're from a bistro!  You will be amazed at how easy and tasty they are; perfect for a special cookout.
ingredients: 1 slice bread, torn into small pieces
4 (1 ounce) slices Cheddar or pepper jack cheese  (Optional)
directions: Place torn bread into a bowl and sprinkle with milk and Worcestershire sauce
Season with basil, rosemary, and pepper
Mix in veal until evenly mixed
Shape veal mixture into four patties
Preheat a grill for medium heat
Grill veal burgers to desired degree of doneness, about 5 minutes per side for medium
Place a slice of cheese on each burger, and allow to melt for about 1 minute before serving on buns
